deploymentModule.description: Deployment binding the apache server and the test client node(s).

image.description: Apache web server appliance with custom landing page.
image.name: examples/tutorials/service-testing/apache

targets.target:
#!/bin/sh -xe
default_site_location='/etc/apache2/sites-available/default' if [ ! -f $default_site_location ]; then default_site_location='/etc/apache2/sites-available/000-default.conf' fi
http_root_location='/var/www/html' if [ ! -d $http_root_location ]; then http_root_location='/var/www' fi
echo 'Hello from Apache deployed by SlipStream!' > $http_root_location/data.txt
service apache2 stop port=$(ss-get port)
sed -i -e 's/^Listen.*$/Listen '$port'/' /etc/apache2/ports.conf sed -i -e 's/^NameVirtualHost.*$/NameVirtualHost *:'$port'/' /etc/apache2/ports.conf sed -i -e 's/^<VirtualHost.*$/<VirtualHost *:'$port'>/' $default_site_location service apache2 start ss-set ready true url="http://$(ss-get hostname):$port" ss-set url.service $url ss-set ss:url.service $url

image.description: Web client tests server connectivity and verifies content.
image.name: examples/tutorials/service-testing/client

targets.target:
#!/bin/sh -xe # Wait for the metadata to be resolved web_server_ip=$(ss-get --timeout 360 webserver.hostname) web_server_port=$(ss-get --timeout 360 webserver.port) ss-get --timeout 360 webserver.ready
# Execute the test ENDPOINT=http://${web_server_ip}:${web_server_port}/data.txt wget -t 2 -O /tmp/data.txt ${ENDPOINT} [ "$?" = "0" ] & ss-set statecustom "OK: $(cat /tmp/data.txt)" || ss-abort "Could not get the test file: ${ENDPOINT}"

parameter.description: Port on which the web server listens
parameter.name: webserver.port
